title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes it's time for the Browns to consider all their options at quarterback this off season with Baker Mayfield suffering a significant shoulder injury. He's not surprised the Dolphins are looking into a controversial trade for quarterback Deshaun Watson as their season is falling apart. He explains how Matthew Stafford's success in Los Angeles is helping younger QBs who ended up with bad teams. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown what we've seen from rookie and number 1 overall pick Trevor Lawrence this season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
